TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit IsolatedStorageFilePermission extends System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStoragePermission
Public NotInheritable Class IsolatedStorageFilePermission Inherits IsolatedStoragePermission

summary.span: 指定私人虛擬檔案系統的容許使用方式。

span.span: Specifies the allowed usage of a private virtual file system.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Common language runtime (CLR) 會使用這個類別來控制對隔離儲存區的存取。The common language runtime (CLR) uses this class to control access to isolated storage. 隔離儲存區會建立應用程式或元件使用獨特的儲存體區域。Isolated storage creates a unique storage area for use by an application or component. 在於應用程式的識別唯一判斷根目錄的虛擬檔案系統，可以存取該應用程式，它會提供，則為 true 的隔離。It provides true isolation in that the identity of an application uniquely determines the root of a virtual file system, which only that application can access. 因此，每個應用程式並自動指派給它自己的檔案區域。Thus, each application has its own file area automatically assigned to it. 此檔案 區域會與其他應用程式，讓該應用程式私用完全隔離。This file area is fully isolated from other applications, making it private to that application. > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用按鍵就無作用， ，或新增堆疊修飾詞，針對使用量或配額。There is no effect if you use , , or to add stack modifiers for usage or quota. 使用方式與配額由辨識項和堆疊查核行程不會執行要求，因此讓上述作業的效果不佳。Usage and quota are determined from evidence and a stack walk is not performed for demands, making the above operations ineffective.

permission.span: 繼承者提供的辨識項，並檢視和修改原則的能力。

span.span: for ability of inheritors to provide evidence and view and modify policy.
Associated enumerations: ,

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 使用指定的完全受限制或不受限制的使用權限，來初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with either fully restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構是完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`隔離儲存區檔案的存取權。Constructs either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to isolated storage files.

exception.span: 參數不是有效的 值。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid value of .

permission.span: 繼承者提供的辨識項，並檢視和修改原則的能力。

span.span: for ability of inheritors to provide evidence and view and modify policy.
Associated enumerations: ,

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Copy() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Copy () As IPermission

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限物件產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission object.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前權限會指定一組完全包含所指定的權限的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是到 c： 代表存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.SecurityElement ToXml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToXml () As SecurityElement

summary.span: 建立權限和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.

returns.span: 權限的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

span.span: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會讓是基於安全性目的 XML 編碼。The method enables the to be XML-encoded for security purposes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是權限，表示代表的所有作業目前的權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
